{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3706408,"name":"Elliot S","username":"ElliotS","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/elliots/{size}/177628_2.png","created_at":"2025-08-08T00:25:06.634Z","cooked":"

Hi CD, I just saw this post form Inheritance Machining. He is a content creator on YouTube that makes videos about machining and drawing and part manufacturing all on fully manual machines! A lot of you have probably heard of him and already subscribed.

The topic of the post is that a machine shop in Lexington Kentucky is shutting down and looking to sell of of there equipment by 8/15. As they said they are getting scrapped if not sold this might be a good opportunity for teams in the area to get some new old machines and some raw materials for relatively cheap.

Link to post:

YouTube

Post from Inheritance Machining

URGENT! Save these machines! Big Augur Machine & Tool in Lexington, KY has closed its doors and needs to sell all their equipment by 8/15 or all these beauti...

Text of post:

URGENT! Save these machines!

Big Augur Machine & Tool in Lexington, KY has closed its doors and needs to sell all their equipment by 8/15 or all these beautiful machines and tools get scrapped. That’s only 9 days from now.

Cincinnati Shaper
Cincinnati Horizontal Mill No. 2MH
Carlton Radial Arm Drill - 9" Column
Journeyman Vertical Bandsaw
Van Norman Brake Drum Lathe No. 204
Surface Grinders
Drill Presses
Welders and welding supplies
Large granite surface plate
Countless shelves of mill, lathe, shaper tooling, fixturing, and metrology equipment.
Lots of raw material.

Email me at inheritancemachining@gmail.com and I can get you in touch.

Photos:

unnamed640×640 34.3 KB
unnamed640×640 54.3 KB
unnamed640×640 35.4 KB
unnamed640×640 58.5 KB
unnamed640×640 51.9 KB

There are two teams in Lexington according to frcmap.com but nether have an contact info I could find, so I am just going to ping a bunch of people here. This is a probably a good time for the mentor slack but I don’t have access and I do not want it for the time being. So if someone else wants to share this over there feel free!

  • Team 2856 - Planetary Drive @John_Z @CrimsonStorm @jeremiahjbarnes @CryptoCrash @njg @Schnyde
  • Team 10137 - RoboKats - @jr190 @TheLil0
